== Main Inclusion Report for sourcepackage ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/squashfs, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Used to create our Live CDs
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=squashfs|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=squashfs|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review: not done
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'normal'.
** No showstopper <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:squashfs|Debian bugs]]</nowiki> that affect us.
** Good <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/s/squashfs.html|maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki>.
*** Debian maintainer responded quickly to our recent problem.
** Active <nowiki>[[http://squashfs.sourceforge.net/|upstream]]</nowiki>.
*** Reponded quickly to, and was very helpful for, our recent problems.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=63835&atid=505341|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper/cdbs/dbs packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
